author: mmusich
body:
# Summary of changes in Global Tags
## RunII data
- **RunII HLTHI processing** : [80X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v8](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v8) as [80X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v7](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v7) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v8/80X_dataRun2_HLTHI_frozen_v7): 
  - new tag for DT and CSC Alignment errors (allow updates via append IOV with hlt synchronization)
- **RunII HLT processing** : [80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v12](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v12) as [80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v11](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v11) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v12/80X_dataRun2_HLT_frozen_v11): 
  -  new tag for DT and CSC Alignment errors (allow updates via append IOV with hlt synchronization)
- **RunII HLT relval processing** : [80X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v9](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v9) as [80X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v8](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v8) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/80X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v9/80X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v8): 
  - new tag for DT and CSC Alignment errors (allow updates via append IOV with hlt synchronization)
# Summary of changes in AlCa Matrix:
- SingleElectron: add HcalCalIsoTrkFilter as requested by @bsunanda
title: Update HLT workflows as at P5 and fix autoAlca
